name: Dano, Inc.
description: Provider of diet products and fitness coaching services intended to aid women stay fit and healthy. The company's products include healthy diet food and supplements and offers a habit-forming program and a women's professional offline studio, enabling women to live healthy lives and achieve their desired fitness goals.
